STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Design and Customize Your Ideal Portable Powerhouse
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Ahead in the Laptop Building Game
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from some of our satisfied laptop builders
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app made building my dream laptop a breeze. The step-by-step guides and wide selection of components streamlined the entire process.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I was amazed by how customizable and user-friendly this app is. It caters to both beginners and experts in laptop building.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: From choosing the right specs to assembly, this app held my hand throughout the laptop building journey. Highly recommended!
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our laptop building app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kind of laptops can I build with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to customize and build a wide range of laptops, from basic models for everyday use to high-performance gaming laptops or workstations for demanding tasks like video editing or 3D rendering.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Do I need any special skills or tools to use the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: No, our app is designed to be user-friendly and guide you through the entire laptop building process step-by-step. All you need is a basic understanding of computer components and specifications.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I customize the laptop's appearance?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! You can choose the laptop's color, material, and even engrave a personalized message or design on the lid or chassis.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How long does it take to receive my custom laptop?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Once you've completed the customization and placed your order, we typically ship custom laptops within 7-10 business days. Shipping times may vary based on your location.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Do you offer any warranties or support for the custom laptops?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, all laptops built through our app come with a standard 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. We also have a dedicated support team to assist you with any questions or issues you may have with your custom laptop.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Design, customize, and assemble your dream laptop with ease.

SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log in to your laptop workspace
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © LaptopBuilder Inc. Build your perfect laptop with cutting-edge components and premium configurations. Unleash ultimate performance.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Get access to the latest and most powerful processors, graphics cards, and memory modules to build high-performance laptops that can handle any task.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Express your style and preferences with our wide range of chassis, keyboards, displays, and customization options to create a laptop that truly stands out.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Keep your laptop running cool and efficient with advanced cooling systems and thermal management technologies designed for optimal performance.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Enjoy extended battery life with our power-saving features and intelligent battery management systems, ensuring your laptop stays powered up for all your on-the-go needs.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Our laptops are built with high-quality materials and designed for durability, making them perfect for both work and travel.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Get access to our knowledgeable support team and extensive resources to help you troubleshoot any issues and get the most out of your custom-built laptop.
CTA_BODY: Our app empowers you to custom-build laptops tailored to your needs. From sleek ultrabooks to powerhouse gaming rigs, we've got you covered.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Customize every component for unrivaled performance and style.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Our Laptop Building App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What components can I customize in the laptop?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: With our app, you can customize the processor, RAM, storage, graphics card, display, and other key components to build your ideal laptop.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I preview the laptop before purchasing?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, our app provides a detailed 3D rendering of the laptop you design, allowing you to preview it from all angles before finalizing your purchase.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How long does it take to receive my custom laptop?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Once you've placed your order, we aim to build and ship your custom laptop within 7-10 business days. Expedited shipping options are also available.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What warranty is included with my custom laptop?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: All custom laptops come with a standard 1-year warranty covering manufacturing defects. Extended warranty options can be added during the customization process.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app guides you through the intricate process of laptop assembly with expert instructions and specialized tools.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Build your dream laptop tailored to your needs - from processing power to storage, displays to peripherals.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Squeeze maximum performance from your custom laptop with our proprietary optimization algorithms and overclocking utilities.
